metadata.title: CVE-2024-38617 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:kunit/fortify: Fix mismatched kvalloc()/vfree() usage The kv*() family oftests were accidentally freeing with vfree() instead of kvfree(). Usekvfree() instead.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
